meanings.definition: A person employed to clean and maintain a building.
meanings.sent1: The janitors work hard to keep the school clean.
meanings.sent2: The janitors are essential for maintaining a tidy environment.
meanings.sent3: The janitors found a creative way to fix the broken vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The janitors are the unsung heroes of the office, silently ensuring everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The janitors diligently scrubbed every corner, leaving no spot untouched.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals responsible for the upkeep of a facility.
meanings.sent1: Our building has a team of janitors who work together to keep it clean.
meanings.sent2: The janitors meet every morning to discuss the day's tasks.
meanings.sent3: The janitors organized a fun competition to see who could clean the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The janitors are the backbone of the hospital, ensuring everything is in top condition.
meanings.sent5: The janitors take pride in their work, making sure the facility shines for everyone.
